Encoders¶

List of implemented encoder classes, submodule of EntityTypingNetwork

class entity_typing_framework.EntityTypingNetwork_classes.input_encoders.BaseBERTLikeEncoder(name: str, bertlike_model_name: str, freeze_encoder: bool = False)¶

Base BERT-based encoder, instances a BERT-like model using AutoModel

Parameters:
name:

the name of the submodule, has to be specified in the yaml configuration file with key model.ET_Network_params.encoder_params.name

this param is used by the EntityTypingNetwork to instance the correct submodule

bertlike_model_name:

required param, used to instance a huggingface AutoModelr.

this param has to be specified in the yaml configuration file with key model.network_params.encoder_params.bertlike_model_name.

this param drives the encoder used by the model. The value of this param has to be equal to the param data.tokenizer_params.bertlike_model_name.

freeze_encoder:

optional param, if setted to True freeze the encoder specified in bertlike_model_name

this param has to be specified in the yaml configuration file with key model.network_params.encoder_params.freeze_encoder

forward(batched_tokenized_sentence, batched_attn_masks)¶

define the forward pass of the encoder; by default is not implemented and raises an exception

Parameters:
batched_tokenized_sentence:
one of the batch elements returned by the dataset (__getitem__ method). It contains tokenized sentences extracted from Dataset Tokenizer
batched_attn_masks:
one of the batch elements returned by the dataset (__getitem__ method). It contains attention masks on the input sentence extracted from Dataset Tokenizer
freeze_encoder()¶

Method used to freeze the encoder instanced with bertlike_model_name

get_representation_dim()¶

returns the output dim of the encoder

Return:
output_dim: dimension of the encoded input (e.g. 768 on DistilBERT)
class entity_typing_framework.EntityTypingNetwork_classes.input_encoders.DistilBERTEncoder(bertlike_model_name: str = 'distilbert-base-uncased', **kwargs)¶
aggregate_function(encoder_output)¶

aggregates the output of DistilBERT by picking the CLS encoding

Parameters:
encoder_output:
output of DistilBERT, commonly shaped as [batch_size, token_number, 768]
Return:
cls_encoding: encoding of the first output token (CLS token), commonly shaper as [batch_size, 768]
forward(batched_tokenized_sentence, batched_attn_masks)¶

defines the forward pass of the encoder. In the forward the batched_tokenized_sentence is processed by DistilBERT and is returned using the method aggregate_function

Parameters:
batched_tokenized_sentence:
see batched_tokenized_sentence in BaseBERTLikeEncoder
batched_attn_masks:
see batched_attn_masks in BaseBERTLikeEncoder
Return:
encoder_output: parameters processed by DistilBERT and aggregated by the method aggregate_function
class entity_typing_framework.EntityTypingNetwork_classes.input_encoders.AdapterDistilBERTEncoder(bertlike_model_name: str = 'distilbert-base-uncased', adapter_arch='Pfeiffer', reduction_factor=16, adapter_name='ET_adapter', **kwargs)¶

Class to instance DistilBERT with Adapters; Subclass of DistilBERTEncoder.

to instance this encoder insert the string AdapterDistilBERTEncoder in the yaml configuration file under the key : model.ET_Network_params.encoder_params.name

Parameters:
bertlike_model_name:
see bertlike_model_name in DistilBERTEncoder.
adapter_arch:

adapter architecture from the original paper on adapters, accepted values are Pfeiffer or Houlsby. Other values will raise an exception

this param can be specified in the yaml configuration file with key model.network_params.encoder_params.adapter_arch.

reduction_factor:
reduction factor from the original paper on adapters. Is an integer number used to setup the autoencoder-like architecture: the hidden units of the autoencoder are computed as transformer_size/reduction_factor
adapter_name:
a name useful when multiple adapters are used.
